ai-patthana8.60:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
ai-patthana8.60:0.3_0: should try to make it known by the body.
ai-patthana8.60:1.1_0: Nor should be given up by developing.
ai-patthana8.60:2.1_0: Not develop the three things that should be given up, not to be given up, but depending on the cause it should be given up.
ai-patthana8.60:3.1_0: Nor should be given up by developing, and cultivating the three things should be given up by developing. It should not be given up by developing, and cultivating.
ai-patthana8.60:4.1_0: There are nine based on the six elements ...
